N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6028.3-A - Exemptions

State Regulations

Some of the requirements for the existing or
prospective school owner, school director or school co-director may be waived
by the commissioner if the security guard training school, or existing or
prospective school owner, director or co-director is: (a) a public or private educational
institution operating under the purview of the New York State Education

Department or an equivalent agency in another jurisdiction; or
(b) a public entity; or
(c) an entity employing security guards on a
proprietary basis for its own use; or
(d) an educational institution conducted on a
not-for-profit basis by firms or organizations, provided that such instruction
is offered at no charge; or
(e) an
employed police or peace officer in good standing. Notes
